mn37:8.6: samupabyūḷho → samupabbūḷho (bj, pts1ed); samūpabbūḷho (si); samūpabyuḷho (sya-all, km)
mn37:14.6: suladdhaṁ te, mārisa → etthantare pāṭho cck, si, pts1ed potthakesu
mn37:15.2: bhagavā ahu → ahunaññeva (si, km); āhunaññeva (sya-all); ahu taññeva (pts1ed) | bhāsitā”ti → bhāsitā (bj); abhāsitthāti (pts1ed, mr)
